title: Commutative Property of Multiplication
text: Notice that the first and third terms are reciprocals, so use the commutative property of multiplication to re-order the factors. We get $$\frac{7}{15} \frac{15}{7} \frac{8}{23}$$.
speech: Notice that the first and third terms are reciprocals, so use the commutative property of multiplication to re-order the factors. We get , 7 over 15, 15 sevenths 8 over 23 .

title: Multiply
text: What do we get after multiplying from left to right?
speech: What do we get after multiplying from left to right?
